title: England outclass Canada to capture glorious Women’s Rugby World Cup triumph
description: England are Women’s Rugby World Cup winners for a third time after beating Canada 33-13 before a world-record crowd at Twickenham
content: If this were a movie, the scriptwriters would be shoo-ins for an Oscar, the plot centred on a dominant team who overcame the heartbreak of losing two back-to-back Rugby World Cup finals to complete an eight-year redemption arc and become world champi... [3927 chars]

title: George Galloway detained at airport under Terrorism Act
description: Counter-terrorism officers stopped the 71-year-old former MP on Saturday as he arrived into Gatwick on a flight from Abu Dhabi.
content:
The Herald understands that Galloway and his wife had arrived into Gatwick on a flight from Abu Dhabi, having travelled from Moscow initially.
Met Police confirmed that a man in his 70s and a woman in her 40s were temporarily detained by counter terr... [2115 chars]

title: 1 Liverpool (27 Sep, 2025) Game Analysis
description: Expert recap and game analysis of the Crystal Palace vs. Liverpool English Premier League game from 27 September 2025 on ESPN (UK).
content:
Liverpool were given a taste of their own medicine by Crystal Palace as Eddie Nketiah's last-gasp winner wrecked their 100% start to the season.
